name: Infiltration (itch) (KBGaming)
description:
As a commander of the Milky Way Federation, it is your job to infiltrate a base of the space terrorists. There, they have developed a computer virus that will topple the federation if left unchecked. Steal the drive containing the virus, and bring it back to home base so the Federation's programmers can create an anti-virus.

Collect various colored drives to open doors of that same color, and beware of the various robots that guard the place. Can you make it out alive?

This game supports Xbox 360 controllers.
